list.expr: sum(ALERTS{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", alertstate="firing", alertname=~"ticdc.*"}) by (alertname) > BOOL 0

panels.description:
The status of each changefeed.

0: Normal

1: Pending

2: Failed

3: Stopped

4: Finished

5: Removed

6: Warning

7: Uninitialized

-1: Unknown
panels.title: The Status of Changefeeds

panels.title: TiKV CDC Incremental Scan Long Duration Region Count

panels.description:
The number of changefeed in different status

0: ReplicationSetStateUnknown means the replication state is unknown, it should not happen.

1: ReplicationSetStateAbsent means there is no one replicates or prepares it.

2: ReplicationSetStatePrepare means it needs to add a secondary.

3: ReplicationSetStateCommit means it needs to promote secondary to primary.

4: ReplicationSetStateReplicating means there is exactly one capture that is replicating the table.

5: ReplicationSetStateRemoving means all captures need to stop replication eventually.
panels.title: Changefeed Status

panels.description: duration for each operator for changefeed
panels.title: Coordinator Operator Cost Duration

panels.title: Worker Send Message Duration Percentile

panels.description:
Bytes / second written off all brokers.
value = one-minute moving average rate of Bytes per second
panels.title: Kafka Outgoing Bytes

panels.description: The current number of in-flight requests awaiting a response for all brokers.
panels.title: Kafka Inflight Requests

panels.description:
The request latency in ms for all brokers.

value = request latency histogram's mean

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_sink_kafka_producer_request_latency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",changefeed=~"$changefeed", instance=~"$ticdc_instance"}) by (namespace,changefeed, instance, broker, type)

panels.title: Kafka Request Latency

panels.description:
Requests / second sent to all brokers.
value = one-minute moving average rate of events per second
panels.title: Kafka Request Rate

panels.description:
Records count per request send to the kafka
value = one-minute moving average of response receive rate
panels.title: Kafka Records Per Request

panels.description: The compression ratio times 100 of record batches for all topics. Compression ratio = Size of original data / Size of compressed data * 100
panels.title: Kafka Producer Compression Ratio

panels.description: MQ worker batch multiple messages into one when using batched encode protocol, this metric record the time cost on batch messages.
panels.title: Worker Batch Duration Percentile

panels.description: MQ worker batch multiple messages into one when using batched encode protocol, this metrics track each batch's size
panels.title: Worker Batch Size Percentile

panels.description: MQ worker send large message to the external storage, this metrics record the message count
panels.title: Claim Check Send Message Count

panels.description: MQ worker send large message to the external storage, this metric record the time cost on send every message.
panels.title: Claim Check Send Message Duration Percentile

panels.description: the number of message count of checkpointTs message
panels.title: Worker Send CheckpointTs Message Count

panels.description: this metric record the time cost of the MQ worker encode and send  checkpointTs messages to downstream
panels.title: Worker Encode and Send Checkpoint Message Duration

panels.description:
The total number of tables in different replication states.

0: ReplicationSetStateUnknown means the replication state is unknown, it should not happen.

1: ReplicationSetStateAbsent means there is no one replicates or prepares it.

2: ReplicationSetStatePrepare means it needs to add a secondary.

3: ReplicationSetStateCommit means it needs to promote secondary to primary.

4: ReplicationSetStateReplicating means there is exactly one capture that is replicating the table.

5: ReplicationSetStateRemoving means all captures need to stop replication eventually.
panels.title: Table Replication State

panels.description: The total number of different schedule tasks.

targets.expr: sum(ticdc_scheduler_task{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$ticdc_instance",namespace=~"$namespace", changefeed=~"$changefeed"}) by (namespace,changefeed, scheduler, task, mode)

panels.title: Schedule Tasks

panels.description: The total number of spans
panels.title: Span Count

panels.description: The total number of tables
panels.title: Table Count

panels.description: The number of current operator count
panels.title: Operator Count

panels.description: The number of total operator count
panels.title: Total Operator Count

panels.description: duration for each operator
panels.title: Operator Cost Duration

panels.description: duration for split span do once check
panels.title: Split Span Check Duration

panels.description: The ID of the slowest table
panels.title: Slowest Table ID

panels.description: The checkpoint ts of the slowest table.
panels.title: Slowest Table Checkpoint

panels.description: The resolved ts of the slowest table.
panels.title: Slowest Table Resolved Ts

panels.description:
The state of the slowest table.

0: ReplicationSetStateUnknown means the replication state is unknown, it should not happen.

1: ReplicationSetStateAbsent means there is no one replicates or prepares it.

2: ReplicationSetStatePrepare means it needs to add a secondary.

3: ReplicationSetStateCommit means it needs to promote secondary to primary.

4: ReplicationSetStateReplicating means there is exactly one capture that is replicating the table.

5: ReplicationSetStateRemoving means all captures need to stop replication eventually.
panels.title: Slowest Table Replication State

panels.description: The count of different kinds of gRPC message
panels.title: gRPC Message Count

panels.description: Outbound network traffic of TiKV CDC component
panels.title: CDC Network Traffic

panels.title: CDC CPU

panels.description: The TiKV-CDC memory quota usage per TiKV instance
panels.title: CDC Memory Quota

panels.description: The memory usage per TiKV instance
panels.title: Captured Region Count

panels.description: The number of incremental scan task in different status.

targets.expr: sum(tikv_cdc_scan_tasks{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance", type="total"}) by (instance) - sum(tikv_cdc_scan_tasks{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance", type=~"abort|finish"}) by (instance)

panels.title: Initial Scan Tasks Status

targets.expr:
sum(rate(tikv_cdc_scan_duration_seconds_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance) / 
sum(rate(tikv_cdc_scan_duration_seconds_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance)

panels.description: The time consumed to CDC incremental scan
panels.title: Initial Scan Duration

panels.description: The time cost on sink incremental scan data

targets.expr:
sum(rate(tikv_cdc_scan_sink_duration_seconds_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance) / 
sum(rate(tikv_cdc_scan_sink_duration_seconds_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance)

panels.title: Incremental Scan Sink Duration Percentile

panels.title: CDC Total Scan Bytes

panels.description: The speed of TiKV CDC incremental scan
panels.title: Incremental Scan Speed

panels.description: The speed of TiKV CDC incremental scan read from the disk
panels.title: Incremental Scan Disk Speed

panels.description: The min resolved ts of each TiKV
panels.title: Min Resolved Ts

targets.expr: (sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_cache_access{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance) - sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_cache_miss{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance)) / sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_cache_access{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance)

panels.description: The ID of the min resolved region of each TiKV
panels.title: Min Resolved Region

panels.description: The time consumed to get an old value (both from cache and from disk)
panels.title: Old Value Seek Duration

panels.description: The total number of cache entries in the old value cache.

targets.expr: sum(tikv_cdc_old_value_cache_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}) by (instance) / sum(tikv_cdc_old_value_cache_length{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}) by (instance)

panels.title: Old Value Cache Size

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_duration_bucket{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (le, instance, tag))

sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_duration_sum{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (le, instance, tag) / sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_duration_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (le, instance, tag)

panels.description: The latency distributions of fsync called by redo writer
panels.title: Redo Fsync Duration

panels.description: The latency distributions of flushall called by redo writer
panels.title: Redo Flushall Duration

panels.description: The latency distributions of writeLog called by redoManager
panels.title: Redo Write Log Duration

panels.description: The latency distributions of flushLog called by redoManager
panels.title: Redo Flush Log Duration

panels.description: The total count of rows that are processed by redo writer
panels.title: Redo Write Rows / s

panels.description: Total number of bytes redo log written
panels.title: Redo Write Bytes / s

panels.description: Redo bgUpdateLog worker busy ratio
panels.title: Worker Busy Ratio

panels.description: TiCDC process rss memory usage. TiCDC heap memory size in use

targets.expr: go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} - go_memstats_next_gc_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} / (1 + ticdc_server_go_gc{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} / 100)

go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} - go_memstats_heap_released_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} - go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"}

go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_other_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"}

panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.title: Estimated Live Objects

panels.description: TiCDC process Go garbage collection STW pause duration
panels.title: GC STW Duration (last 256 GC cycles)

panels.description: The throughput of Go's memory allocator.

panels.description: TiCDC process rss memory usage. TiCDC heap memory size in use

targets.expr: go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} - go_memstats_next_gc_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} / (1 + ticdc_server_go_gc{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} / 100)

go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} - go_memstats_heap_released_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} - go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"}

go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_other_sys_bytes{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"}
